description: Try our easy to follow Rustic Potato Cake with Pastrami & Sour Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rustic Potato Cake with Pastrami & Sour Cream
name: Rustic Potato Cake with Pastrami & Sour Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a grill on high. Sprinkle top of potato cake with cheese. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden. Serve.
